title: The Google Maps alphabet UK: an A to Z of the British Isles
content:
Something interesting at the Telegraph website. Not all of the letters are great, but there are some gems.

[http://www.telegraph.co.uk/technology/picture-galleries/5757548/The-Goog...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021123916/http:/www.telegraph.co.uk/technology/picture-galleries/5757548/The-Google-Maps-alphabet-UK-an-A-to-Z-of-the-British-Isles.html "http://www.telegraph.co.uk/technology/picture-galleries/5757548/The-Google-Maps-alphabet-UK-an-A-to-Z-of-the-British-Isles.html")

author: mili

comments.content: A thread on " [object alphabets](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021123916/http:/typophile.com/node/59652#comment-360605)" I started a while back.

That image must be the x-height, Mili :-)

ChrisL
